name: Funky Space
description:
"Funky Space" is game made during the "HEXCODE SHOWDOWN JAM" where you must use certain color scheme.

Gameplay:

You are somewhere in space on unknown planet on a space station base. But that doesn't really matter now. Today's agenda - get launch codes for spaceships, and launch them! Complete tasks and finish the game!

Controls:

WASD - movement
Space - jump
Shift - sprint
F - use objects
Left click - use weapon
Mouse - look around

(controller inputs are also mapped, 
just too lazy to write them all here)

Assets:

* Space Kit from kenney.nl

* Some audio effects found on opengameart.org (sorry, forgot from which places I took them, please message me if need to credit!)
